Itâ€™s Gay Pride today. Yesterday, as N and I were on our way to the cinema, somebody yelled â€œDYKES!â€ at us.

Is the gap between straight people and gay people bigger than we care to admit? If â€œweâ€ want to fit into â€œyourâ€ world â€” which I think weâ€™ve already been doing for decades, just to the inattentiveness of some â€” is it smart of gay people to seclude ourselves to spaces designed for people like us? Iâ€™m for emancipation, and against exception.
